problem.markdown:
>>Most population scientists agree that the human population will level off by the year 2100. What is the most common estimate for world population at that time?<< () 5-8 billion (x) 8-11 billion () 11-14 billion () 14-17 billion () 17-20 billion
[explanation] Most population scientists believe that world population will level off between approximately 9 and 10 billion people by the year 2100. [explanation]
problem.p: Most population scientists agree that the human population will level off by the year 2100. What is the most common estimate for world population at that time?

choicegroup.label: Most population scientists agree that the human population will level off by the year 2100. What is the most common estimate for world population at that time?

div.p: Most population scientists believe that world population will level off between approximately 9 and 10 billion people by the year 2100.
